name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Dong Mingzhu said in an interview recently that she usually wakes up at 3 a.m. and sends notices to employees. She called this behavior "everyone's enthusiasm." She also said that she is a workaholic, thinking about Gree 24 hours a day, and has never been to school to see her children. Netizens said: "Chun Chun has a brain disease" "Dong Mingzhu can go to a mental hospital" "The scary thing is that she doesn't think there is a problem with this and still talks about it" https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1893332571624480770/pu/img/dHZDgSzGG2A0Ijf4.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 21, Guangdong. A man recently rode a motorcycle to Dongguan and was fined 200 yuan and one point by the traffic department for "driving a motor vehicle in violation of a prohibition sign." However, the man said that there was no prohibition sign at the scene, and the staff had photoshopped a picture with a prohibition sign and posted it on 12123. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1893333792217038848/pu/img/sbNIbPaW0Pqugzq8.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 22, Tianjin. A man went to Beijing to petition because his house was demolished. Afterwards, he received a call from the police station. The police said that the petition video was sensitive and asked him to delete the video. But the man refused and said he couldn't delete it. As of now, the video of the man's conversation with the police has been deleted. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1893337033487110144/pu/img/qTbxXRaYW_TztHox.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 21, Shanghai. A man said that after the Chinese New Year, many companies, stores, and office buildings in Shanghai were giving up their leases. The security guard of his office building said, "About one-third of them either didn't come or the company announced bankruptcy," and the rent of office buildings has also dropped across the board. The man also said that in addition to office buildings, many shops along the street are now closed, and they are in the downtown area.
The media "One Real Estate" recently reported: The rent of the core area Nanjing West Road section has fallen below 10 yuan. According to Colliers International data, in the fourth quarter of last year, the vacancy rate of Grade A office buildings in Shanghai was about to break the international 20% warning line, and the rent fell month-on-month to 6.54 yuan per square meter per day.
In addition to the South Bund, where the vacancy rate is over 10%, the vacancy rate of the Xintiandi section is as high as 21%. Among the 18 secondary core areas, 13 sections have a vacancy rate of more than 20%

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 18, Guangdong. A veteran said that the land belonged to him before he joined the army, but after he joined, the village committee took back his land while he was away.
February 18, Baoji, Shaanxi. A veteran said that after he retired from the army, he borrowed 3.6 million yuan to start a business, but the factory and land were occupied by the village tyrants. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1893382371530919937/pu/img/OM1_w1RhNLQzdOcu.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 22, Anhui. An old man recalled the famine years: "I ate everything, grasshoppers and crickets running on the ground, I caught them and ate them raw." The old man began to wipe his tears halfway through his speech: "Don't mention the past. Many people starved to death in my village. The adults were reluctant to eat the porridge they got in the canteen, and took it home to feed the children. In the end, the adults starved to death. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1893526831187275776/pu/img/vfzTfbhE5h42V5u0.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 22 (Released) Ningbo, Zhejiang. Leaders inspected, traffic police blocked the road and hindered people's travel. A man stood in the middle of the road and stopped a Toyota Coaster and shouted: "Who is the leader?" https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1893568303433687043/pu/img/u8B6OfNVxvQgESSz.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 22, Guangdong. A netizen said that when he went to the street office to print an unemployment certificate, the staff said, "It is no longer called an unemployment certificate, but an "employment and entrepreneurship certificate" https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkdbPG9WkAAeEzr.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 22 (Release) Jingshi Kindergarten booked a theater to watch "Nezha 2" and the children sang the national anthem and saluted in the cinema.
February 21, Huaibei, Anhui. A man invited hundreds of sanitation workers to watch "Nezha 2". The workers raised the national flag and sang the national anthem in the cinema.
February 21, Henan. The soldiers brought their own yellow stools and collectively impacted the box office of "Nezha 2". Netizens: The individual competition is over, and the team competition will start. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1893585871917518849/pu/img/Dk0R2p6Pmtl_GDOv.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Guangdong Qingyuan No. 1 Middle School forces students to fill out a "voluntary application" for weekend self-study at school, and attaches a guarantee letter
Wuhu No. 3 Middle School uses a formatted form to force students to "voluntarily apply" for evening self-study, and school can only be dismissed at 9:30 pm
We have received submissions from more than 50 schools forcing students to "voluntarily make up lessons"
Welcome to click on the questionnaire to register your school:

Also welcome to visit our second phase of exposure of forced "voluntary" schools:
